attributes.action: Lift the 3 am licensing laws in Scotland
attributes.background: Almost every big European city has a massive international clubbing scene which attracts millions of tourists and boosts the economy, apart from Scotland as our clubs have to shut at 3 am, why are we in the stone age when it comes to our nightlife? Sign the petition and lets get the discussion going

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
